text: Anante Jehu'ma tevefima kre fanenehu ofama huteno'a, sondia vahe'ane kva vahe'anena huzamanteno, nompi ufreta magore huta ozamatreta ana maka zamahe vagareho. Anagema hige'za ufre'za ana maka vahera kazinteti zamahe vagarete'za, zamavufaga'a eri'za kumamofo fegi'a ome atre'naze. Anama hute'za ete e'za Balima mono hunentaza nomofo agu'afi ufre'naze.
